duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform daily Quality Assurance activities to ensure that products are safe, wholesome, and meet stated requirements.
Comply with company and plant Food Safety and Animal Care & Well-Being policies, including USDA and state regulations, HACCP program, SSOP’s, and GMP’s.
Monitor product attributes to ensure product quality meets specified levels.
Conduct pre-operational and operational sanitation procedures, including pre-operational swabs.
Support production staff regarding quality standards, product specifications, and GMP’s.
Compile reports on nonconforming product and plant issues.
Maintain HACCP, SSOP, lab, and plant quality records.
Conduct required audits of the recordkeeping files to ensure compliance with company and regulatory policies.
Create/modify databases, analyze extracted data, and make recommendations to management.
May be required to complete Lab work including setting up samples, running tests, working with various lab equipment, and reporting results.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent required; bachelor degree in poultry/animal science, biology, or chemistry preferred.
